import {useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function EachListing({listing, onDelete}) { const {id, address, property_type, area_in_sqm, beds, baths, garages, price, image_url} = listing const navigate = useNavigate() function handleDelete(id) { fetch(`/listings/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" }).then((r) => { if (r.ok) { on } }); } return ( <>


{address}

{property_type} | $ {price}.000
Click here to view

  • Area

    {area_in_sqm}m 2

  • Beds

    {beds}

  • Baths

    {baths}

  • Garages

    {garages}
) } export default EachListing;
